snippet: The Chinese-American author and star of a new movie that tackles globalization and high finance has talked about the wide varieties of Asian identity, and the general western tendency to lump all Asians into a single category.
abstract: The Chinese-American author and star of a new movie that tackles globalization and high finance has talked about the wide varieties of Asian identity, and the general western tendency to lump all Asians into a single category.

headline.main: Asian Identity and the Global Economy
